item.description:
Hi All!

So sorry it took a few days to update the next meeting site and times. But we have a very cool evening planned!

We are meeting at 7:00PM this evening so it is a little earlier than normal. We have a guest speaker coming in. Ron Rosenstock will be joining us to discuss the art of creating a photography book. Since the evening is all about books, we are meeting at the library in the Banx room. We only have the place till 9 so anyone who wants to join us at Caffe Dolce after the meeting is welcome too. there is an extra bonus to that after party too...We will have a lovely look at Beth Roberts Photo Show up at the cafe.

Can't wait to see you all again!

cheers,
Donna

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: The Worcester Photography October Meetup
